collection.name: Porccubus
collection.openText: Now it’s time for my head to burst. Good day.

observe.desc:
[ {<Head Explosion Time> To be honest, daily life here is not so fun. The company says they promote healthy hobbies, but not many employees engage in that notion.
Everybody has their own escape. Violence, gambling, eating... I thought I had a high level of discipline compared to others. And it helped me to live a smoother life. Maybe that is the reason why I was assigned to Porcuvous.
Yes, about Porcuvous... Only the employees who live the lowest of the low are assigned there.
I’ve heard what other employees do in the Containment Facility. They call it "trust game”. Trust game, what an elegant way to call it.} ]

specialTipSize.specialTip: When the work result was good, Qliphoth counter has increased.
When the work result was bad, Qliphoth counter has decreased.
Employees Temperance Level 3 or below and have a Good work result will be killed by the Abnormality.
Employees Temperance Level 3 or below will receive very strong White damage from the escaped Abnormality.
The escaped $0 was not affected by the attack coming from outside its attack range.
